description: Change of use to A3 restaurant.
decision_conditions:
FORMAL DECISION:  The Planning Inspectorate allow the appeal and grant planning permission for change of use from A2 (Financial and Professional Services) to A3 restaurant at 1 Highbury Crescent, London, N5 1RN in accordance with the terms of the application reference: P040127, dated 19th January 2004 and the plans submitted therewith, other than the external flue shown on drawing number 3254/PL02, subject to the following conditions:

1)  The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

2)  The premises shall be used for a restaurant and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A3 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking or re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

3)  The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 0800 and 2300 hours on Mondays to Saturdays and shall not be open at all on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

4)  The premises shall not be brought into use until details of the external flue and the provision to be made for refuse storage have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.
